name: Papa Up - Fly Higher!
description:
Papa Up! is an addictive one-touch mobile game. Help the little birds fly up and avoid the obstacles. Collect coins to unlock dozens of cute characters. This game will keep the player entertained for hours!

FEATURES:
- Addictive one-touch gameplay.
- 30 built-in characters with cute blocky style.
- Daily reward system.
- In-app purchasing
- Leaderboards
